results.title: Live Laugh Love Decal, Living Room Wall Art, Above the Bed, Vinyl Wall Decal, Bedroom Decor, Farmhouse Style Decor
results.description:
Our Live Laugh Love decal looks lovely just about anywhere in your home! This living room wall art comes in a fresh farmhouse style lettering and looks like it's painted on your wall because we use only high quality matte vinyl.

We have 60 colors to choose from for our vinyl wall decals - the colors in the drop down menu above are the most popular colors.  The rest of our colors can be viewed by scrolling over the photo and following the right arrow to our color chart.  Let us know in a "note to buyer" if you would like one of these alternate colors from our color chart.

Questions? Convo us - we'd love to help!

ABOUT OUR WALL GRAPHICS:

*All Old Barn Rescue Company graphics are copyright designs. They are for personal use only and may not be used in resale.

Our vinyl has a MATTE finish and can go on any CLEAN, smooth, dry, non-porous surface (wall, glass, plastic, etc.). It is removable although not reusable. (Please note, upon removal slight 

You don't have to put each letter on individually! Application instructions are included with every shipment.

**Important note about wall graphics: wall graphics need to be applied in a timely manner, preferably within 2 weeks of receiving your shipment. The longer the vinyl sits after being cut, the harder it becomes to release from the backing paper. As you plan the timing of your purchase, also know that new paint needs to cure at least 2 weeks before applying vinyl or the vinyl will not want to stick.

SHIPPING:

Every effort will be made to produce your order as fast as possible upon receipt of payment (usually within 3 days). Please note custom orders may take up to 5 business days to process.

We ship via USPS First Class Mail.

PAYMENT:

We accept Visa, Mastercard and PayPal.

ADDITIONAL INFO:

If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return any unused decals to us within 7 days of purchase for a full refund of the purchase price (minus shipping).

We will continue to introduce new designs so check back often. Thanks again for your business!

results.title: Folded Book Pattern for Live Laugh Love in Sathscha Font
results.description:
This is a cut and fold pattern for the the words Live, Laugh, Love in a 3 line pattern.  The font is Sathscha which I have a commercial license to use and publish.

This makes a great addition to any home decor. 

All of our patterns are tested.

You will need a book with at least 349 pages and where the pages are at least 21cm high.  



Although I am in the USA... I find it a lot more precise and easy to use centimeters so this pattern is in cm.  

This is for the pattern only, not on how to do a MMCF (Measure, Mark, Cut, Fold).   If you need direction on 'how to' there are many youtube videos.
  

Note that this is a digital file.  That means when you purchase, you will immediately have access to the file.  Because of this, we are unable to offer any refunds.  If you have any questions please ask.

results.title: For God So Loved the World That He Gave His Only Son John 3:16 Cross Vinyl Decal in Black or White FREE US SHIPPING Multiple Sizes
results.description:
Listing is for 1 -  For God So Loved the World That He Gave His Only Son John 3:16 Cross Vinyl Decal in black in size chosen.
Need a size not listed, contact us and we can create a new listing

Great for your walls, windows, computer laptop, cellphone.

Shipment
USA Shipping 
Standard Shipping is First Class Package Service with tracking, estimated to take 3-5 business days.
Priority Mail comes with tracking, it can take 2-3 business days.
If you would like to upgrade your shipping, items may arrive quicker than estimated times but none guaranteed per USPS.

International Shipping
Standard Shipping does not come with tracking, if you would like tracking at least out of the USA as far as destination country allows then upgrade to USPS First Class Shipping.
Additional sizes are available by request! Thank You!!!!

We are family owned and operated business, located in South Georgia.
We design, produce and ship everything we sell in America.
We use only the best name brand vinyl.

Our decals are very easy to install.
Simply clean the desired location, remove the backing and then apply the decal to the surface with a credit card type object.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Art, Aqua Gray Bedroom Wall Decor, Prints or Canvas Bedroom Pictures, Dahlia Flower Wall Art, Bathroom Decor Set of 3
results.description:
Aqua and gray Live Laugh Love wall art is perfect for decorating any space; from master bedrooms to bathrooms! These stunning flowers go with any decor, and will look great for many years to come.

Includes 3 pieces of wall art
Available as PRINTS (Frame NOT included) or CANVAS

PRINT OPTION
Printed borderless on a professional lustre photo paper with a fine grain pebble texture.
Features a rich, sharp color that won't fade or yellow and will last for years to come
Prints are water and fingerprint resistant. Always display prints under glass for maximum print life.
If picture frames are shown in a listing photo it is for inspirational purposes only.
Picture frames are not included with the purchase of a listing.

CANVAS OPTION - Ready to hang!
Museum quality gallery wrapped canvas 100% polyester base with a 2x1 weave
Printed on genuine artist canvas using UV resistant archival inks which will not scratch or fade in a lifetime.
Mounted onto a 1-1/4" deep frame with an extra 1/4" bleed around the back.
Frame is built with a solid face to support the canvas and keep it from deforming and loosening.
Finished black backing and comes ready to hang with pre-installed hanging hardware.
Your gallery wrapped canvas will always look as tight and flat as the day it was made.

COLOR OPTIONS
Want different colors? View my COLOR CHART for more options.

Need custom colors? No worries! You are not limited to the colors shown on my color chart. Designs can be matched as closely as possible to your décor. Please provide a link to your décor in the note section during checkout. If you do not have a link and need to send a picture, please include in the note with your order that a picture of your décor has been sent for color matching via Etsy messages.

PLEASE NOTE - Colors on your screen may appear different in print. Some online display images use colors that are not shown on my color chart.
If you do not specify colors, I will create your order with the colors in the first example image of the listing.

Please read my shop POLICIES before checkout.
https://www.etsy.com/shop/lovelyfacedesigns/policy

results.description:

results.title: Love Never Fails - Broken Heart - Love Painting - Whimsical Wall Art Print - Whimsical Dog Art - Whimsy - Lessons in Love
results.description:
Artist-Signed and Numbered Limited Edition (n of 321)

This is a professional quality UNFRAMED, archival, museum-quality giclee print of my original illustration. The giclee is produced using premium archival medium. This is an Epson print on satin rag paper, produced in the highest quality for remarkable detail, color saturation, and depth of image.

SIZE
This UNFRAMED giclee print is approximately 12x18 with a white border surrounding the piece for framing.

SHIPPING
Items ship within 2-3 business days. Please let me know if you need your purchase rushed for a gift, I will try my best to accommodate you – no extra charge – with the exception of any additional shipping fees I may incur.

Prints are shipped flat in a protective sleeve with a backer board. 

Thanks for visiting and please feel free to ask me any questions!

results.title: W.T.F. Daily News Headlines Some Humorous Notebook Doodles
results.description:
W.T.F. Daily News Headlines
Some Humorous Notebook Doodles

1.  A. Wiener('s) Email Smacked...correction...Hacked.

2.  Col. Sanders Chokes at Chicken Franchise Convention Speech.

3.  A Famous So-and-So Farted at Her 40th Birthday Bash.

4.  A Famous So-and-So's Mom Applies Lipstick on Her 3 Year Old Daughter.

5.  A Famous Athlete Displays A Very Serious Expression on His Face...(a must see).

6.  When Having Second Thoughts - A story on eating breakfast tacos...watching the food prep make each one while snot running down her nose...(Yikes!)

7.  A Famous So-and-So Forgot to Wear Pants to the Red Carpet.

8.  Frankenma's Computer Repair Shop.

9.  Rex in the City - a modern version of King Kong vs. Godzilla.

10.  Across the street from Moody Bank - Happiness Instead Bank

11.  Sticks-n-Stones Assertiveness Training Class

12.  I. Wenta Kallage University

13.  Smart People vs. Intelligent People - on Common Sense vs. Book Knowledged.

14.  Kuremi Finances Pharmaceutical Company

15.  Southern Spread Outhouse Bar and Grill

16.  Big Valley Tampons Mfg. Co.

17.  Cobwebs No-More Gynecologist

18.  A Texas style bakery called, "Yeah, Come and Bake It"

19.  "A Sign of the Kinds" - a very short story on today's kindness, gentleness and Love.

20.  A drug store flashing advertisement sign:
  Old Farts, Old Tarts, Smart Cookies, Toots and All Those Who Are Older Than Dirt - 50% Off All Condoms, Sanitary Napkins and Birth Control Items.

em Crabby

(Items in the picture are not for sale...just this word file of notebook doodles..Thank you).

Support Operation Smile

Note: Please use MEMO, an editor writing software, in oder to open this digital file.

results.title: Live Laugh Love T-Shirt, Inspirational Shirt, Positive Quote Shirt, Motivational Shirt, Believe Shirt, Workout Shirt, Gift For Her
results.description:
All my designs are printed on high quality Bella + Canvas unisex T-shirts which are soft and comfortable to wear. The designs are applied to the fabric using water-based inks in a Direct-To-Garment (DTG) process that produces high-quality results. This technology leaves a smooth finish. 

This t-shirt is everything you've dreamed of and more. It feels soft and lightweight, with the right amount of stretch. It's comfortable and flattering for both men and women. 

• 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (Heather colors contain polyester)
• Ash color is 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester
• Heather colors are 52% combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester
• Athletic and Black Heather are 90% combed and ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester
• Heather Prism colors are 99% combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester
• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz (142 g/m2)
• Pre-shrunk fabric
• Side-seamed construction
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping

SIZING
Sizing is UNISEX. It will fit true to size for men. Please size down if you prefer a more fitted look. You may want to measure your favorite T-shirt and compare it to the size chart I have included in the listing pictures. 
Please see size chart for details.

SHIPPING
All items are made to order and have a fulfillment time of 1-5 business days before they are shipped. Standard shipping times are typically 2-6 business days after fulfillment but may be longer during a busy holiday season.
Please make sure that the address you have on file with Etsy is the correct address. I am not responsible for items being delivered to the wrong address. 

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
We recommend washing inside out in cold or warm water with like colors. Dry on low to medium heat or hang to dry.

results.title: Live Laugh Love  Cake Topper, Rustic Cake Topper, Personalized Cake Topper, Wood Cake Topper
results.description:
Live Laugh Love  Wedding Cake Topper. 
A lovely way to make your special cake unique. 

Each cake topper is made from high-quality plywood and carefully crafted by hand.

*** SIZE:  5 - 7 inches ( 12-17 cm )
You can choose the size of your cake topper (the width) in the drop-down menu. If you need a different size, please convo and we'll be happy to make it for you.

*** COLOR: 
Our Cake Toppers can be made in Light Wood, Dark Wood, Golden, Silver, and White color 

*** PRODUCTION TIME AND DELIVERY: We need 3-5 business days to make a cake topper. Items are shipped from Ukraine via the registered international airmail. The order can be shipped in all the countries all around the world. Delivery term to the European countries is about 10-16 business days while shipping to the USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, and other countries usually takes 14-25 business days. 

Also, you can choose an Express Delivery option at the checkout process, in this case, delivery takes 3-5 business days.


***HOW TO ORDER:
- Add the item(s) to your shopping cart. Write your text for Personalization in the “Note to Us” at checkout. 
- Check your spelling carefully before submitting an order as we copy and paste your provided text.
- Submit your payment to complete your order – use the PayPal method at checkout.

We also have a few more cake toppers, please see the link

https://www.etsy.com/shop/BestWeddEver?ref=seller-platform-mcnav&section_id=20295265

Your Wedding Cake Topper may not look exactly like the example as shown because your Names or Dates may be Longer or Shorter than in a sample.

If you don't find what you are looking for, please send us a convo with your desires, and we'll be happy to make a completely custom order for you.

**DELIVERY CONDITIONS
The average delivery time for most countries is 2 - 4 weeks.
Please, pay attention that during Christmas, New Year and other holidays, the delivery time can be increased by 7-14 days.
Unfortunately, we don't have control over the package once it passes customs, and is to be delivered via your postal delivery company, and we can`t be responsible for losses or delays! Also, we can’t be responsible for various force-majeure that may affect the delivery time.
We cannot refund or credit your account if your order not delivered on time. 
Please, take into consideration that all costs for international delivery (fees, taxes, and duties) are the responsibility of the buyer.
If your order is returned to us due to, a wrong address, refusal to pay customs fees, refusal to accept the order or because no one was there to accept delivery for some of your reasons, we can ship it back, but you will need to pay the shipping cost again.


If you have any questions, please contact us.

***CANCELLATIONS
We accept cancellations.
Please contact us within 2 hours of purchase
Please note, we will refund your credit card as follows: You will be refunded the total amount of the order, minus the 8% charge as this amount is charged during the ordering process by the Payment system.

results.title: Etched Hand Stamped Metal Wallet Card - Laugh, Love, Live - Father's Day - Wedding - Engagement
results.description:
Create a beautiful life long treasure! A credit card-sized wallet insert, etched with wise words we should all live by. This piece came from a customer request, and I lay no claim to the quote or the layout, but it was so lovely I wanted to offer it.

We take your choice of 16 gauge nickel silver or copper, then etch it with the quote, add a colored patina (many choices available - just ask!) and lightly hammer the edges and texture the surface. The cards measure 3 inches wide by 2 inches tall, and will fit perfectly in a credit card slot in your beloved's wallet! We can also custom etch your favorite saying, verse, or lyric! Just ask!

The card will arrive in a gifty box.

U.S. shipping INCLUDES INSURANCE.

Please like us on Facebook! Copy/paste the link below!
https://www.etsy.com/shop/MadamePoindextra

NOTES TO BUYER:
Processing time is the production time that is required BEFORE SHIPPING. If you want to see the latest date that your order is scheduled to ship go to your Your Account=>Purchases and click on the receipt for your order. Orders are usually shipped before that date, but in times of high volume it could take that long. If you need your order by a particular date, like a gift-giving occasion, please leave a note at checkout and we will do our best to accommodate. If that is not possible we will be happy to provide an image of the item to print so that you don't have to show up empty-handed!

Also check the shop announcement for the most current production time.
https://www.etsy.com/shop/MadamePoindextra?ref=listing_127124183

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS:
Please be aware that items shipped to your country may be detained in customs for an undetermined period of time. There is no way to contact the customs office to find your item and, except for Canada, tracking only works while the item is in the U.S. In the near future there will tracking to about 30 other countries, many of which are in the European Union. Many countries may require 4-6 weeks from the time the order leaves the U.S. until it is delivered to your door. This requires a certain amount of trust and patience. If an item takes longer than six weeks please contact us.

Also be aware that some countries, particularly the UK, will charge a VAT tax to import your purchase into the country. The VAT tax is the responsibility of the buyer and is not related to shipping cost.
